sub_title: Dutch to English Communication Specialist: writing, editing, translation, training
summary:
Teaching children: mainstream education
Educational and Academic publishing: as Assistant Editor, Editor, Commissioning Editor and Managing Editor (books and journals) 
Cultural exchange work (UK - Netherlands): for the British Council (education/exhibitions)
Teaching adults: business and professional English  
Establishing and running a business in a second language/cultural environment

Specialties: Translation (NL-EN) and editing services: earth and environmental sciences, education, management and organisation, urban architecture and development, music, international cuisine, social history, travel.
